requires—
“‘appointed date” means the date of the commencement of this Act;

‘Commissioner’ means the Commissioner of Agrarian Services, and includes any Deputy Commissioner of Agrarian Services and, in the case of any area for which any Assistant Commissioner of Agrarian Ser- vices is appointed, such Assistant Commissioner;
“ principal Act” means the Paddy Lands Act, No. 1 of 1958, as amended from time to time by any subsequent Act; .
